name: BSO
comment:
>>37768122
We've been helping organize people when convenient, because no one is really certain of what they should be doing.

I'm making conscious effort, though, to make sure that your party members are acting independently. It's not tiring for me, and depending on what route you guys take with leadership, you'll be giving more or fewer orders in the future.

For now, though, being able to take charge of what the others are doing to some extent sort of gives you a little bit more agency, I think.
